channel.title: math.HO updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.HO updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: A Brief Review of Fixed Points, Hex Game and Hex Theorem
item.description: arXiv:2508.00865v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Understanding the Impossibility of a Tie in Hex via Fixed Point Theorems, the Hex Theorem, and Their Equivalence.
item.dc:creator: Cho Yang

item.title: Hexagonal Tiling of the Plane
item.description: arXiv:2508.01404v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: Since the thesis of K. Reinhardt in 1918, it is well known that there are exactly three types of convex hexagons that can tile the plane. However, the proof of the fact is far from being complete. We prove this fact, under an assumption much weaker than the convexity.
item.dc:creator: Ze Zhu, Erxiao Wang, Min Yan
